name: World Nuclear Council
goal:
As Institution, WONUC activities are oriented and centralized in the defense of the rights of professionals and employees of the nuclear related industry and science, in Europe and all over the World:
- Promoting the European Principals and Objectives in these domains;
- Promoting the European Industry of peaceful applications of nuclear energy, as well as the related non-proliferating technologies;
- Generating and development relations between organizations and institutions, academia and civil society, representing the interests of professionals and employees of the nuclear related science and industry;

Organizing and participating in most of nuclear related projects, events and debates contributing to:
- The construction of the image of nuclear energy and its public acceptance;
- The improvement of the knowledge with respect to public acceptance about nuclear energy and its peaceful applications; and
- The enhancement of scientific and technical knowledge on the peaceful applications of nuclear energy.

Considering the peaceful applications of nuclear energy in the problematic of sustainable economic, ecological and social developments.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
